app_desc: Open up a world of emotions with our app for people with autism spectrum disorder
introduction:
Welcome to EmotionSense
a unique app designed for people with autism spectrum disorder!
introduction_desc: We understand that recognizing emotions can be difficult, which is why we created this app to help you better understand and interact with the emotional aspects of the world around you

hidden.headline: Camera is hidden
hidden.subheadline: For your comfort, we have hidden the camera display

training.headline: Emotional training
training.subheadline: This section is designed to allow you to practice expressing different emotions

static.headline: Image upload
static.subheadline: Here you can upload a photo and get the result of emotion analysis, based on which you can better understand the state and expression of the face in the photo
static.description: The analysis process may take some time, depending on the size of the file and the speed of your internet connection. Please be patient

sorry: This mode is under development. Be with us and we will definitely succeed
